title: MariaSwap
author: MariaSwap
content: Hello,After working for some time within the p2p of the largest cryptocurrency exchanges in the world, I am launching my own semi-automatic platform, where you will be able to exchange your cryptocurrencies for cash at attractive rates. I am looking for partners to jointly develop a profitable affiliate program.Make your exchange at https://mariaswap.comFor suggestions and partnerships, contact us via Telegram https://t.me/mariaswapWe are online 24 hours for your convenience.If you can't find the pair you want, send us a message and we'll arrange it for you.We can cover existing offers on the market to attract loyal customers.

comments.author: Bitum
comments.body: The site seems somehow familiar to me) in the neighboring topic is the same website but for electronic currency exchange service. Is the same team running both websites? Both websites are absolutely identical in structure.

comments.author: MariaSwap
comments.body: Quote from: Bitum on November 08, 2022, 08:03:19 PMThe site seems somehow familiar to me) in the neighboring topic is the same website but for electronic currency exchange service. Is the same team running both websites? Both websites are absolutely identical in structure.Hi,Thank you for your question.Our platform may be similar to other sites, as it is a commercial system where we pay a license to use it.Contact us on telegram: @MariaSwap
